title: LeetCode Badge Showcase
title:pt-BR: Exibir o Badge do LeetCode (LeetCode Badge Showcase)
description: 在你的 Github README 页面展示你的 LeetCode 徽章。
description:en-US: Showcase your LeetCode badges on your Github README page.
description:pt-BR: Exiba seus emblemas (badges) do LeetCode na sua página README do Github.

querys.name: theme
querys.moreDescription: 可选值：`dark` `light` `github-dark` `monokai` `tokyonight` `nightowl` 更多主题请参考 [Themes](https://github.com/KevzPeter/Leetcode-Badge-Showcase?tab=readme-ov-file#-themes)。
querys.moreDescription:en-US: Supported: `dark` `light` `github-dark` `monokai` `tokyonight` `nightowl` More themes please refer to [Themes](https://github.com/KevzPeter/Leetcode-Badge-Showcase?tab=readme-ov-file#-themes).
querys.moreDescription:pt-BR: Suporta: `dark` `light` `github-dark` `monokai` `tokyonight` `nightowl` Para mais temas, por favor, verificar [Temas](https://github.com/KevzPeter/Leetcode-Badge-Showcase?tab=readme-ov-file#-themes).

querys.name: filter
querys.description:en-US: show a specific set of badges
querys.description:pt-BR: Exibir um conjunto específico de badges
